RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>1 to 6 months</treatment_length> <satisfaction>2</satisfaction> <effectiveness>2</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Absence of Menstrual Periods</condition> <comment>I started taking this after taking loestrin fe. I been on it for almost 3 months and after the first month I stopped getting my period. I already have one kid so its kind of scary if you just suddenly stop gettin periods. Also i never had acne till I got on this pill.</comment>
